query:
ALTER TABLE defects 
ADD COLUMN type ENUM('CAR', 'PAR', 'NCR') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'CAR' AFTER taskId,
ADD COLUMN checklistId INT AFTER type,
ADD COLUMN checklistItemId INT AFTER checklistId,
ADD COLUMN rootCause TEXT AFTER severity,
ADD COLUMN correctiveAction TEXT AFTER rootCause,
ADD COLUMN preventiveAction TEXT AFTER correctiveAction,
ADD COLUMN dueDate TIMESTAMP AFTER preventiveAction,
ADD COLUMN ncrLevel ENUM('major', 'minor') AFTER dueDate,
ADD COLUMN verifiedBy INT AFTER resolvedAt,
ADD COLUMN verifiedAt TIMESTAMP AFTER verifiedBy,
ADD COLUMN verificationComment TEXT AFTER verifiedAt,
MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('reported', 'rca_pending', 'action_plan', 'assigned', 'in_progress', 'implemented', 'verification', 'closed', 'rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'reported';
